blocks.name: cfwddif
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for the forward difference operator.

blocks.name: df-fwddif
blocks.content: Define the forward difference operator. This is a discrete analogue of the derivative operator. Definition 2.42 of [GramKnuthPat], p. 47. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-May-2020.)

blocks.name: cfwddifn
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for the nth forward difference operator.

blocks.name: df-fwddifn
blocks.content: Define the nth forward difference operator. This works out to be the forward difference operator iterated ` n ` times. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-fwddifn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cfwddifn, cmpo(s0, s1, cn0, co(cc, cpm, cc), cmpt(s2, crab(s3, cc, wral(s4, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), wcel(co(cv(s3), caddc, cv(s4)), cdm(cv(s1))))), csu(s4, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s0), cbc, cv(s4)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s4))), cmul, cfv(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: fwddifval
blocks.content: Calculate the value of the forward difference operator at a point. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fwddifval(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(cfwddif, c0), c1), co(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), c2))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, cfv(cfwddif, c0), c1, co(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, c1)), crab(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2)), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), universe, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cfwddif, c0), cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2)), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  fvmptd3(hs2, cfwddif, c0, cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), co(cc, cpm, cc), cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(cv(hs2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(cv(hs2)))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), universe, w0)
  df-fwddif(hs2, hs0, hs1)
  mpteq12dv(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(cv(hs2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(cv(hs2)))), co(cfv(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  rabeqbidv(hs1, cdm(cv(hs2)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(cv(hs2))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0)))
  eleq2d(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(cv(hs2)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  dmeq(cv(hs2), c0)
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs2), c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  fveq1(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, co(cc, cpm, cc)), wf(c0, c2, cc), wss(c2, cc))
  mpanl12(wa(wf(c0, c2, cc), wss(c2, cc)), wcel(c0, co(cc, cpm, cc)), wcel(cc, universe), wcel(cc, universe))
  elpm2r(cc, universe, cc, universe, c0, c2)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe), wcel(crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), universe))
  eqeltrd(cdm(c0), universe, c2, w0)
  ssexd(c2, cc, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  rabexg(hs1, cdm(c0), universe, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0)))
  mptexg(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), universe, co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  mpteq1d(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), crab(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2)), w0)
  rabeqbidv(hs1, cdm(c0), c2, w0, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2))
  eleq2d(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), co(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, c1))))
  oveq12d(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0, caddc, nat1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c1, crab(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), c2))
  elrab(hs1, c1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), c2))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2, co(c1, caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c1, caddc, nat1)
  ovexd(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))), co(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs2.c(co(cc, cpm, cc))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(hs1, cdm(c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cdm(c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), c2))
}

thm fwddifval(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((_/_\ ` c0)` c1)=((c0 `(c1[+]1))[-](c0 ` c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1[+]1)∈ c2)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, (_/_\ ` c0), c1, ((c0 `(c1[+]1))[-](c0 ` c1)), { hs1 ∈ c2 |(hs1[+]1)∈ c2 }, ((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0)), universe, w0)
  eqtrd((_/_\ ` c0), (hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ c2 |(hs1[+]1)∈ c2 } ↦((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0))), (hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)} ↦((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0))), w0)
  fvmptd3(hs2, cfwddif, c0, (hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)} ↦((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0))), (ℂ[p↦]ℂ), (hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ dom(hs2)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(hs2)} ↦((hs2 `(hs0[+]1))[-](hs2 ` hs0))), universe, w0)
  df-fwddif(hs2, hs0, hs1)
  mpteq12dv(hs0, { hs1 ∈ dom(hs2)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(hs2)}, ((hs2 `(hs0[+]1))[-](hs2 ` hs0)), { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)}, ((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0)), hs2 = c0)
  rabeqbidv(hs1, dom(hs2), dom(c0), hs2 = c0, (hs1[+]1)∈ dom(hs2), (hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0))
  eleq2d((hs1[+]1), dom(hs2), dom(c0), hs2 = c0)
  dmeq(hs2, c0)
  oveq12d((hs2 `(hs0[+]1)), cmin, (hs2 ` hs0), (c0 `(hs0[+]1)), (c0 ` hs0), hs2 = c0)
  fveq1(hs2, c0, (hs0[+]1))
  fveq1(hs2, c0, hs0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℂ), (c0 : c2 → ℂ), c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  mpanl12(((c0 : c2 → ℂ)∧ c2 ⊆ ℂ), c0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℂ), ℂ ∈ 𝕌, ℂ ∈ 𝕌)
  elpm2r(cc, universe, cc, universe, c0, c2)
  3syl(w0, (hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)} ↦((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0)))∈ 𝕌, dom(c0)∈ 𝕌, { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)} ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrd(dom(c0), universe, c2, w0)
  ssexd(c2, cc, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℂ ∈ 𝕌)
  cnex()
  rabexg(hs1, dom(c0), universe, (hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0))
  mptexg(hs0, { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)}, universe, ((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0)))
  mpteq1d(hs0, { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)}, ((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0)), { hs1 ∈ c2 |(hs1[+]1)∈ c2 }, w0)
  rabeqbidv(hs1, dom(c0), c2, w0, (hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0), (hs1[+]1)∈ c2)
  eleq2d((hs1[+]1), dom(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 = c1, ((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0))=((c0 `(c1[+]1))[-](c0 ` c1)))
  oveq12d((c0 `(hs0[+]1)), cmin, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 `(c1[+]1)), (c0 ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fvoveq1(hs0, c1, c0, caddc, nat1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  sylanbrc(w0, c1 ∈ { hs1 ∈ c2 |(hs1[+]1)∈ c2 }, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[+]1)∈ c2)
  elrab(hs1, c1, c2, (hs1[+]1)∈ c2, (c1[+]1)∈ c2)
  eleq1d((hs1[+]1), c2, (c1[+]1), hs1 = c1)
  oveq1(hs1, c1, caddc, nat1)
  ovexd((c0 `(c1[+]1)), cmin, (c0 ` c1), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 `(c1[+]1))[-](c0 ` c1)))
  diff.hs0.c({ hs1 ∈ c2 |(hs1[+]1)∈ c2 })
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c((hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)} ↦((c0 `(hs0[+]1))[-](c0 ` hs0))))
  diff.hs2.c((ℂ[p↦]ℂ))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs1.c(dom(hs2))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs1[+]1)∈ dom(c0)})
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w((c1[+]1)∈ c2)
}

thm fwddifnval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, cfwddifn, c1), c2), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(c1, co(c2, caddc, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wcel(co(c2, caddc, cv(s0)), c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, cfwddifn, c1), c2), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(c1, co(c2, caddc, cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))

  a1i(w0, wceq(cfwddifn, cmpo(hs2, hs3, cn0, co(cc, cpm, cc), cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cc, wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(cv(hs3))))), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs2), cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(cv(hs2), cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(s0))))))))))
  df-fwddifn(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1, s0)
  adantl(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c1)), wceq(cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cc, wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(cv(hs3))))), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs2), cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(cv(hs2), cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(s0))))))), cmpt(hs0, crab(hs1, cc, wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(c1)))), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(s0)))))))))
  mpteq12dv(hs0, crab(hs1, cc, wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(cv(hs3))))), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs2), cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(cv(hs2), cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(s0)))))), crab(hs1, cc, wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(c1)))), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(s0)))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c1)))

  adantl(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c1), wb(wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(cv(hs3))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(c1))))
  eleq2d(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cdm(cv(hs3)), cdm(c1), wceq(cv(hs3), c1))
  dmeq(cv(hs3), c1)
  sumeq12dv(s0, co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs2), cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(cv(hs2), cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(s0))))), co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, cbc, cv(s0)), cmul, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), cmul, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(s0))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c1)))
